packets.name: Extended Command
packets.description: Wrapper packet for extended command subpackets. Used for both client-to-server and server-to-client communication.

subpackets.name: Quest Arrow Click
subpackets.description: Client clicked the quest tracking arrow

subpackets.name: Client Info
subpackets.description: Client type and flags (Spy on Client)

subpackets.name: Stat Lock Info
subpackets.description: Stat lock states and bonded status

packets.name: Screen Size
packets.description: Client reports screen size.

packets.name: Party Message
packets.description: Client sends party-related commands.

values.name: Private Message
values.description: Send private message to party member

packets.name: Quest Arrow Click
packets.description: Client clicked the quest tracking arrow.

fields.name: Right Click
fields.description: True if right-clicked, false if left-clicked

packets.name: Disarm Request
packets.description: Client requests to disarm opponent.

packets.name: Stun Request
packets.description: Client requests to stun opponent.

packets.name: Language
packets.description: Client sets language preference.

packets.name: Close Status
packets.description: Client closes a status gump.

fields.name: Serial
fields.description: Serial of mobile whose status to close

packets.name: Animate
packets.description: Client requests to play an animation.

fields.name: Action
fields.description: Animation action ID (must be in valid list)

packets.notes: Only specific animation IDs are allowed for security.

packets.name: Client Info
packets.description: Client type information sent once at login. ModernUO currently ignores this packet data.

fields.name: Client Type
fields.description: Client type flag (same as character create/login)

related.note: Client Type packet - similar client type information

packets.notes: ModernUO registers this packet but ignores its data (calls Empty handler). The client type should match the value in 0xE1 Client Type packet.

packets.name: Query Properties
packets.description: Client queries Object Property List (tooltip) for an entity.

packets.name: Context Menu Request
packets.description: Client requests context menu for an entity.

fields.name: Target Serial
fields.description: Serial of entity to show context menu for

packets.name: Context Menu Response
packets.description: Client selects an option from context menu.

fields.name: Target Serial
fields.description: Serial of entity context menu was shown for

packets.name: Stat Lock Change
packets.description: Client changes stat lock (STR/DEX/INT).

packets.name: Cast Spell
packets.description: Client casts a spell (optionally from spellbook).

packets.name: Query Design Details
packets.description: Client requests house design details.

packets.name: Race Change Reply
packets.description: Client response to race change confirmation gump.

packets.name: Bandage Target
packets.description: Client uses bandage on a target.

packets.name: Targeted Spell
packets.description: Client casts spell with pre-selected target.

packets.name: Targeted Skill Use
packets.description: Client uses skill with pre-selected target.

packets.name: Target By Resource Macro
packets.description: Client uses resource-based targeting macro.

packets.name: Toggle Flying
packets.description: Client toggles gargoyle flying mode.
